Launched in 2000, PS2 marked an evolution in home console gaming, set a new standard for players and developers alike and introduced some of the features that still define the PlayStation experience today.

Since launch, PS2 sold over 155 million consoles worldwide and had almost 4,000 games released up to late 2013, making it the highest selling and most played console of all time.

As well as great games, PS2 boated the birthplace of online gaming, high definition graphics and an integrated DVD player.
